attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!!!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely TERRIBLE!!!!! Took ages to download, and crashed my phone every single time I opened it!!! I had to do a hard reset every time I attempted to use this app. It is a very bad design. Wish I could give it 0 stars.

attributes.title: Nooo
attributes.review: I hate this app so much you should not download it it gives a private information to many people and I got many calls after it and I find it very disrespectful

attributes.title: Let’s start off with how bad it is
attributes.review: I downloaded it and apparently this trump guy is a rapist? Jk we knew that! 1. it took forever to download and I had to sell my Balls for it 2. It tried stealing all my information from china

attributes.title: Worst app in the world
attributes.review: Hi I hate trumps app and the fact that it tracks you when you aren’t even using it and it also does that with your battery and gave me a virus all in all get rid of this app

attributes.title: Terrible and fake
attributes.review: Would not recommend getting this app takes forever to download and so many ads and its not the real thing

attributes.title: TERRIBLE😒😔
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app. When I opened it up it had a weird picture of a child pedo dressed as a clown🤡 yuck! I was so disgusted that i puked 48 times and had to get rushed to the hospital. Would not recommend to a friend or family member. 😔😔😔😔😔

attributes.title: Bruh my freezer
attributes.review: not exactly sure how this app is still on the store🤐! Logged on 👁after it took 7 ⏱hours to download⬇️!! Went on 📲and then it glitched💀 and it overheated🔥my phone📱 . Had the throw it😟in the freezer❄️. Then my freezer⛄️exploded💥. Sick🤢and tired😴of this Donald trump🐷🍊app and bunker boy🙅🏼‍♂️ himself🤬!

attributes.title: Horrible Experience!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support that one old guy that looks like an orange but then it turns out he was a scammer who tried to make me spend money !!!!! Do not download this app or you will get scammed of money !!!

attributes.title: JUMP SCARE, CHYNA
attributes.review: When I opened the app I was immediately greeted with an orange devil. There was no warning or anything. A truly horrifying experience. Also there was a lot of CHYNESE propaganda. The hats, flags and everything was made in CHYNA. Truly an unworthy app. Should definitely be deleted and looked into

attributes.title: Sadly Disappointed
attributes.review: Just wanted to make sure my non homophobic, non racist, and VERY intelligent president was doing everything he could in preventing further deaths from covid, sadly disappointed; ego too big for a mask to cover, poor thing 😔😔
